order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_account, user_name, user_identity, position, email, telephone, personal_image_id, birthday, password) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIdentity,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalImageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
